trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<wst:Lifetime>" name="<wst:Lifetime>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 代表<xref uid="langword_csharp_<wst:Lifetime>" name="<wst:Lifetime>" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: This optional element is used in `wst:RequestSecurityToken` or `wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse` messages to indicate the desired or required lifetime of a token.
trans-unit.target: 此選擇性項目用於`wst:RequestSecurityToken`或`wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse`訊息，以表示想要或需要的存留期語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: All times are specified in UTC time.
trans-unit.target: 指定所有時間以 UTC 時間。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Lifetime"></xref> class with the specified creation and expiration time.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Lifetime"></xref>類別指定的建立與到期時間。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the token creation time in UTC.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>代表語彙基元建立時間-utc 時區。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the token expiration time in UTC.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>表示權杖的到期時間-utc 時區。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The time specified by created occurs before the time specified by expires.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的時間 created 之前所指定的時間，就會發生 expires 。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Lifetime"></xref> class with the specified creation and expiration time.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.Lifetime"></xref>類別指定的建立與到期時間。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the token creation time in UTC.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>指定語彙基元的建立時間-utc 時區。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the token expiration time in UTC.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>指定權杖的到期時間-utc 時區。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The time specified by created occurs before the time specified by expires.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的時間 created 之前所指定的時間，就會發生 expires 。

trans-unit.source: Gets the token creation time in UTC time.
trans-unit.target: 取得權杖的建立時間以 UTC 時間。

trans-unit.source: Represents the `<wst:Created>` child element.
trans-unit.target: 代表`<wst:Created>`子項目。

trans-unit.source: This optional element specifies the time at which the token is created.
trans-unit.target: 此選擇性項目會指定的建立語彙基元時。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the UTC time at which the token is created.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>語彙基元建立當時的 UTC 時間表示。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the token expiration time in UTC time.
trans-unit.target: 取得權杖的到期時間以 UTC 時間。

trans-unit.source: Represents the `<wst:Expires>` child element.
trans-unit.target: 代表`<wst:Expires>`子項目。

trans-unit.source: This optional element specifies the time at which the token expires.
trans-unit.target: 此選擇性項目會指定在權杖到期的時間。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the UTC time at which the token expires.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>在權杖到期 UTC 時間表示。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
